cleanup status error message

timeline.bodyText: Why is this message parsing necessary? And I guess you need to check if the message is null before calling lastIndex()
timeline.author: J-N-K

replies.bodyText: I chose to parse out the most user friendly part of the message since it would be displayed to the user. Otherwise it would look like tinyb.BluetoothException: GDBus.Error:org.bluez.Error.NotReady: Resource Not Ready. I'm parsing it so it just comes out to Resource Not Ready. But you are correct that I should null check so I will add that.
replies.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText: In General I dislike string parsing in front of logging as it is done Always, no matter what log level is set. In this case however it happens only very rarely, therfore I'm fine with it.
replies.author: J-N-K

timeline.message:
